title: BMW 2008-2 Road Map Europe Pro inc European Speed Cams
description:
BMW 2008-2 Road Map Europe Professional DVD inc European Speed Cameras


This contains the European Speed Camera Database (JUNE07).


Suitable for: E87, E9x, E60, E61, E65 & 6-series
NOT SUITABLE FOR: MK4 DVD & Business Nav



The speed camera POIs are available for ALL of the languages on the disc:

ENG, FRE, GER, ITA & SPA


Default language: ENG


Countries included:

AD,AT,BE,CH,CZ,DE,DK,ES,FI,FR,GB,GI,GR,IE,IT,LI,LU ,MC,NL,NO,PT,SI,SK,SM,VA


-Still NO full postcode search.. :(
-Improved POI sub-category searching
eg hotel parking availability, type of restaurants


1 Download torrent & please SEED
2 Burn iso image with NERO etc onto blank DVD+R **DUAL LAYER 8.5GB**
  Finalise disc, if option available
  Tested ok with Verbatim DVD+R DL x2.4 & x4
  Tested ok with Aone (Ricoh) DVD+R DL x2.4 & x4
3 Stick disc in car DVD slot
4 Follow iDrive instructions & re-start car after 5 minutes
5 Choose Euro Speed Cams in CAR category of POIs


NOTE:
You will NOT be able to burn using ordinary DVD+R discs!

You MUST use a DUAL LAYER DVD burner, a DUAL LAYER DVD+R 8.5GB disc & appropriate software (Nero, ImgBurn, Toast etc)
